column7: Schematic design and development of a public building focusing on the integration of environmental, structural, and building envelope systems, while also addressing issues of accessibility, life safety, environmental stewardship, and site conditions. Field trips may be required. 6 graduate hours. No professional credit. Prerequisite: ARCH 536 and ARCH 537.
column9: 6 graduate hours. No professional credit. Prerequisite: ARCH 536 and ARCH 537.
